name: Improved Eviscerate
baseDescription: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 5%.

name: Remorseless Attacks
baseDescription: After killing an opponent that yields experience or honor, gives you a 20% increased critical strike chance on your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, or Ghostly Strike.  Lasts 20 sec.

name: Malice
baseDescription: Increases your critical strike chance by 1%.

name: Ruthlessness
baseDescription: Gives your finishing moves a 20% chance to add a combo point to your target.

name: Murder
baseDescription: Increases all damage caused against Humanoid, Giant, Beast and Dragonkin targets by 1%.

name: Improved Slice and Dice
baseDescription: Increases the duration of your Slice and Dice ability by 15%.

name: Relentless Strikes
baseDescription: Your finishing moves have a 20% chance per combo point to restore 25 energy.

name: Improved Expose Armor
baseDescription: Increases the armor reduced by your Expose Armor ability by 25%.

name: Vile Poisons
baseDescription: Increases the damage dealt by your poisons by 4% and gives your poisons an additional 8% chance to resist dispel effects.

name: Improved Poisons
baseDescription: Increases the chance to apply poisons to your target by 2%.

name: Cold Blood
baseDescription: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next Sinister Strike, Backstab, Ambush, or Eviscerate by 100%.

name: Improved Kidney Shot
baseDescription: While affected by your Kidney Shot ability, the target receives an additional 3% damage from all sources.

name: Seal Fate
baseDescription: Your critical strikes from abilities that add combo points  have a 20% chance to add an additional combo point.
